messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Jury Duty - Off Topic (was Re: Censorship and Unscho...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/6/2003 11:30:28 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Oh, SHIT. ... Does it matter that the graffiti is on clothing? (first lesson learned: one
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/2003 11:30:28 PM Eastern Standard Time,
pamhartley@... writes:
> the participants are all members of a
> skateboarding

Oh, SHIT.

>and graffiti gang

Does it matter that the graffiti is on clothing?

(first lesson learned: one does
> not want one's children to cultivate the society of some to most
> skateboarders. Who knew?)

Uh oh.

> . The
> skateboarding gang called themselves Grim Crew

Oh. Ours is called Menace to Society. <g>

I enjoyed your jury post. I'm sorry for the tragedy.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
